label: 往生伝
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: “biographies of the saved,” hagiographic accounts of those who have been reborn in the Western Paradise of Amida Buddha, compilers of which included Yoshishige Yasutane (?-1002) and Öe Masafusa (1041-1111).
